!5ll! <color=#df840e>{0}</color> citizens suffered from cholera! You need a clinic or hospital to cure the sick.
!5lm! <color=#df840e>{0}</color> citizens suffered from measles! You need a clinic or hospital to cure the sick.
!5ln! <color=#df840e>{0}</color> citizens suffered from tuberculosis.You need a clinic or hospital to cure the sick.
!5lo! <color=#df840e>{0}</color> citizens suffered from pandemic flu! You need a clinic or hospital to cure the sick.
!5lq! The <color=#df840e>administrator's</color> term of office has expired.
!5m8! New Reputation Lv reached. Click to check the unlocked contents.
!5mc! All the warehouses are full. Production will be stalled.
!5mf! Product to be replaced next time: {0}
!5mg! Hi, thank you for finding us a great settlement. We can now create our own town on the new territory!

!5mh! During your creation, you need to not only develop your town, but also to maintain citizens' living and prevent the town from dying. Next I'll walk you through the <color=#DF840E>basic operations</color> in game.
!5mi! First, let's move the <color=#DF840E>camera</color> to observe the surroundings of the town.
!5mj! Pressing <color=#DF840E>W A S D</color> or moving the mouse to the edges of screen to move the camera. The Edge Scrolling Sensitivity can be closed in <color=#DF840E>Settings</color>.
!5mk! You can press <color=#DF840E>Q</color> and <color=#DF840E>E</color> to rotate the view.
!5ml! You can also rotate the view by holding the <color=#DF840E>middle mouse button</color> and dragging the mouse left and right.
!5mm! Stand tall can see more and further. Let's try scrolling the <color=#DF840E>middle mouse button</color> to <color=#DF840E>zoom in and out</color>.
!5mn! You can also press <color=#DF840E>Page Up</color> and <color=#DF840E>Page Down</color> to zoom the camera.

!5mo! In the red box, hover over the specific area to quickly learn about the amount of <color=#df840e>Silver Coins</color>, <color=#df840e>Citizen Statistics</color> and <color=#df840e>Fertility Rate</color> of the current town.

!5mp! <color=#df840e>Silver coins</color> can be obtained through <color=#df840e>Trade</color>. <color=#df840e>The fertility Rate</color> is directly related to housing, population ageing and citizen stress.

!5mq! The information in the red box is a key index to manage and run the town. Here's <color=#DF840E>Technology</color> in the middle, <color=#DF840E>Happiness</color> and <color=#DF840E>Health</color> on the left and right.

!5mr! First, let's get to know about <color=#DF840E>Technology</color>. You can choose the industry you prefer to develop first, such as Agriculture, Mining, or Logistics based on your current resources. Comprehensive development of all industries is also an option.

!5ms! On the left side is the <color=#DF840E>Happiness</color>. When Happiness is low, citizens will consume more food and be more likely to commit crimes. When happiness is high, citizens are significantly more productive.
!5mt! There are 7 ways to improve the Happiness, such as improving <color=#DF840E>Garment, Shoes, Food Ration</color> and so on. Try increase the citizens' Happiness by developing your town!

!5mu! On the right side is the <color=#DF840E>Health</color>. When the Health is low, citizens are prone to disease and inefficient, plague can break out and lead to death of citizens. When the Health is high, citizens need less stamina consumption and be able to work longer.
!5mv! There are also seven ways to improve the Health, such as <color=#DF840E>Medicare, Sanitation, Waste Disposal etc.</color> The Health of citizens is important for the development of the town.
!5mw! Excellent! The next area is the timeline which indicates the upcoming events <color=#DF840E>in the next 16 months</color>, like arrivals of immigrants, disasters, merchant ship.
!5mx! We can foresee the events in the timeline and thus make decisions and adjust strategies accordingly.
!5my! Many convenient tools are set at the two corners of the screen to help you manage and understand the town better.
!5mz! <color=#DF840E>Resource Monitor</color> and <color=#DF840E>Town Details</color> are two more important tools.
!5n0! Let's learn about the <color=#DF840E>Town Details</color> first. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Town Details</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: I</color>) to get started.

!5n1! In Town Details, you can check the <color=#df840e>Town Overview</color>, <color=#df840e>Structure Overview</color>, <color=#df840e>Production Graph</color>, <color=#df840e>Stock Management</color>, <color=#df840e>Population Graph</color>, <color=#df840e>crops and animals</color> and other related information.
!5n2! The interface in the upper left corner is <color=#DF840E>Resource Monitor</color>, you can see what resources the town currently has and the quantity.
!5n3! And we can also <color=#DF840E>tick</color> the box of one specific resource to monitor the quantity of it.
!5n4! The banner alert or the state alert icon at bottom left corner tells you the current problem that both the town and citizens are facing, and you will need to solve them.
!5n5! Please click the left banner alert or the state alert icon at left bottom corner to open the <color=#DF840E>citizen</color> details.
!5n6! We can view the citizen's name, state, personal needs, profession etc. in the <color=#DF840E>citizen</color> details interface.
!5n7! Knowing the current needs of citizens and thus solve problems accordingly. We can even switch to the citizen's perspective to observe the town.
!5n8! Great! Now we can <color=#DF840E>right-click</color> or press the <color=#DF840E>Esc</color> key to quickly close the interface.
!5n9! Now please close the citizen details interface.
!5na! Through the observation by moving the camera, you might notice plenty collectable resources around the town which secure the production and development in early stage.
!5nb! And then we will learn about how to operate, collect and use the resources.
!5nc! The red box right below is mainly structures related. We have categorized the structures to make searching and construction more convenient for you.

!5nd! More than functional structures, there are also decorations. Press <color=#DF840E>Tab</color> or click the small circle to switch to Decorations. You could upgrade and decorate the town as you want.
!5ne! Alright! Now let's collect the resources. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Command</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 0</color>) to get started.
!5nf! After opening the Command tab, you can see there are many options. Please click <color=#DF840E>Fell Trees</color> to collect Timber.
!5ng! After clicking <color=#DF840E>Fell Trees</color>, please select an area on the map. Citizens will collect related resources in the selected area.
!5nh! When the selected area is too large, the time taken to collect resources will be quite long. If you've selected a large area, you can still click <color=#DF840E>Halt</color> to cancel tasks.

!5ni! You might notice the process of collecting resources and building structures is quite slow. Adjust the speed by pressing hotkeys as below: Slow Down (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey:F1</color>), Speed up (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: F2</color>), Pause (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: Space bar</color>).
!5nj! Please press <color=#DF840E>F2</color> three times to speed up the game to 10 times (<color=#DF840E>*10</color>) faster.

!5nk! Well done! Now you have got certain amount of resources to help the homeless citizens. Click <color=#DF840E>Houses</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 1</color>) to check the types of houses.
!5nm! Citizens who have houses to live in can quickly restore stamina. Living in better houses can greatly improve citizens' Happiness.
!5nn! Press <color=#DF840E>R</color> to rotate the structure when placing it, and press <color=#DF840E>F</color> can change the model of building.
!5no! For structures under construction, click the building to open the details interface where you can see the progress and building materials needed.
!5np! You can also click <color=#DF840E>Prioritize</color> button to prioritize the construction of the structure.
!5nq! The existing buildings are also adjustable. Please click <color=#DF840E>Marketplace</color> to enter the details interface.
!5nr! Click the slider button to disable the structure. When the structure is disabled, the provided function will also be shut down.
!5ns! Now you have closed the <color=#DF840E>Marketplace</color>, but there's no other <color=#DF840E>Marketplace</color> and citizens need it.
!5nt! Please click the slider button again to enable the structure. When the structure is functional, laborers will automatically get to work.

!5nu! Supplies from gathering and production will be stored in a structure that have storage function, now we have got one. Clicking the <color=#DF840E>Storable Items</color> button to manage your items.
!5nv! Please click the <color=#DF840E>Durable Storage Yard</color> and then click <color=#DF840E>Storable Items</color> button to check out the items.
!5nw! Awesome! Now you have known the basic controls.
!5nx! The next tutorial will take you through the operation of maintaining <color=#DF840E>survival and development</color> of the town.
!5ny! Congratulations on passing the last tutorial!
!5nz! Now let's learn about how to maintain the <color=#DF840E>survival and development</color> of the town.
!5o0! As we mentioned before, housing is essential for citizens, or it will lead to inefficiency and low speed of restoring stamina.
!5o1! Please click the <color=#DF840E>Houses</color> button (Hotkey: <color=#DF840E>1</color>) and build <color=#DF840E>a House</color>.

!5o2! Citizens in one house will start a family and have children under a good condition. After the children turn into adults, they will move to a new house and start their own families. If you want to <color=#DF840E>grow the population</color>, then sufficient amount of houses will be needed.
!5o3! When placing a house, you can press <color=#DF840E>R</color> to change the direction, and press <color=#DF840E>F</color> to change models. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a House</color>.

!5o4! After citizens have their own house, considering and solving the problem of basic living will be the next. There are many ways to get food, gathering, hunting, planting, animal husbandry and fishing, etc.
!5o5! Now let's learn about <color=#DF840E>Farming</color>. First we need a <color=#DF840E>Standard Field</color> as the farming area.
!5o6! Please click the <color=#DF840E>Agriculture</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 2</color>) to open the menu bar.
!5o8! After the <color=#DF840E>Standard Field</color> is built, you need <color=#DF840E>Seeds</color> to plant. Planting in the proper season and temperature is a key to ensure the output.
!5o9! Please click the built <color=#DF840E>Standard Field</color> and enter the detail interface.
!5oa! Click <color=#DF840E>Choose</color> button to grow any crops you currently have. Differences in yield and cold tolerance exist between different crops.

!5ob! After choosing the crops you want to plant, we just need to wait for the crops to be harvest naturally when they are ripe. You can also choose to harvest manually, but the output will correspondingly be reduced.
!5oc! Great! Now we have a stable source of foods, besides that, water is also an important resource for survival and production.

!5od! Water can not only be used in survival and production but also in transaction. When there's fire, citizens will get water from Water Mill and Big Well to put out the fire. So it's important to make sure there are enough of these buildings in town.

!5oe! Please click <color=#DF840E>Resources</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 3</color>) to open the menu bar, and then select and build a <color=#DF840E>Big Well</color>. It is best to build it next to houses so that citizens can better prevent and extinguish fires.
!5og! The Big Well has been built. Structures that have single production function will automatically help you choose what to produce and put it to work.
!5oh! When the structure can produce multiple products, you will need to choose what to produce so the structure can be functional.

!5oi! Now the citizens have clean water. Plantation is only one of the ways to source foods, there are other ways. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Resources</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 3</color>).

!5oj! Now that's learn more about <color=#DF840E>Gathering</color>. Foods and <color=#DF840E>seeds</color> can be obtained from gathering. Citizens can gather foods manually but the gathering job mainly be done in the <color=#DF840E>Gatherers Hut</color>.
!5ok! The gatherer in the <color=#DF840E>Gatherers Hut</color> will gather wild plants, fermenting material within the range. It's one of the most important ways to obtain raw material.
!5ol! Gatherers Hut is better built in the forest but don't get too far from the residential area. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Gatherers Hut</color>.

!5om! In addition to <color=#DF840E>Gathering</color>, citizens can obtain meat, furs, animal cubs and other by-products through <color=#DF840E>hunting</color>. So you will need a <color=#DF840E>Hunters Hut</color>.

!5on! The hunting range is the whole map, hunters will firstly hunt animals nearby. Hunters can not hunt across river if the bridge is not build. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Hunters Hut</color>.
!5oo! There are other ways of sourcing foods for you to explore. Timber can be used in producing Domestic Fuel, and it is the most important material for construction.

!5op! Now we've learned how to fell trees but the <color=#DF840E>Foresters Hut</color> will be more productive than cutting trees in wild, and will plant saplings in the process of cutting trees. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Foresters Hut</color>.
!5oq! In many cases, we will have multiple structures are building at the same time. We can arrange more builders to speed up the process of construction.

!5or! Please click <color=#DF840E>Builders Cabin</color> to arrange more laborers become <color=#DF840E>builders</color>. Open structure details interface and use Hotkey <color=#DF840E>+</color> to increase workers, and Hotkey <color=#DF840E>-</color> to reduce workers.
!5os! Citizens' basic living have been greatly secured with your lead. If you want to expand the scale of the town and the population, you need to build more different types of buildings.
!5ot! After citizens' basic life is guaranteed, we also need to improve their work efficiency to speed up the development of the town.

!5ou! Now let's get to know about <color=#DF840E>Processing</color>. We have built some structure for producing primary products, now we can process them into advanced or even higher value products by <color=#DF840E>Processing</color>.

!5ov! Clothes that people need on daily basis, tools, domestic fuel etc. are produced from these structures. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Processing</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 4</color>).

!5ow! <color=#DF840E>Clothes</color> can ensure the citizens to work outside longer even in cold weather and protect them from freezing to death. In <color=#DF840E>Tailor</color>, animal's fur, linen and cotton cloth can be made into clothes.
!5oy! Even if citizens have clothes now, it's still tough for them to get through the frigid winter. They can get warm in the house but it consumes <color=#DF840E>Domestic Fuel</color>.
!5oz! In <color=#DF840E>Chopping House</color>, timber can be processed into Domestic Fuel. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Chopping House</color>.
!5p0! After securing the citizens' survival, we need to improve their work efficiency. <color=#DF840E>Tools</color> have great impact on working efficiency.
!5p1! Primary <color=#DF840E>Tools</color> can be made in <color=#DF840E>Smithy</color>. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Smithy</color>.

!5p2! In the basic tutorials, we've known about Happiness and Health. The higher value of <color=#DF840E>Happiness</color> and <color=#DF840E>Health</color>, the greater citizens' life. It's also a sign that the town is well-developed.

!5p3! There are structures for improving <color=#DF840E>Happiness</color> and <color=#DF840E>Health</color> in the <color=#DF840E>Services</color> menu bar. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Services</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 6</color>).
!5p4! There are accidents might cause sickness and injuries during the course of labor and life, hence we need a <color=#DF840E>Clinic</color>.
!5p5! <color=#DF840E>Clinics</color> provide medical coverage and adding a small amount of Health for citizens. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Clinic</color>.
!5p6! Citizens will have higher spiritual pursuit when they have a healthy body. <color=#DF840E>Chapels</color> provide spiritual support for citizens.
!5p7! The Happiness will increase in the range of <color=#DF840E>Chapel</color>. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Chapel</color>.
!5p8! When the town is growing, the distance among the areas gets further which cause the low traffic efficiency. The river is also an obstacle for citizens to expand the town and collect resources.
!5p9! So we need <color=#DF840E>Bridges</color> to cross rivers. Different <color=#DF840E>roads</color> can improve the traffic efficiency.
!5pa! Please click the <color=#DF840E>Roads</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 7</color>) to open the menu bar and select <color=#DF840E>Bridge</color>.
!5pb! Build <color=#DF840E>a Bridge</color> across the river at any spot you preferred.
!5pc! In the menu bar of <color=#DF840E>Roads</color>, we can build <color=#DF840E>Dirt Road</color> or other advanced roads after the city is in a stable development.
!5pd! Roads can improve citizens' speed and greatly help the production and transportation.
!5pe! Excellent! Now you have learned how to maintain the <color=#DF840E>survival and development</color> of the town.
!5pf! The next tutorial will introduce operations about <color=#DF840E>Technology and Trade</color>.
!5pg! Glad to meet you again! This tutorial will show you how to develop <color=#DF840E>Technology and Trade</color> of the town.

!5pi! There are abundant fishery resources around the town for us to utilize. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Agriculture</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 2</color>) to open the menu bar, and select <color=#DF840E>Fishing Dock</color>.
!5pj! Please build <color=#DF840E>a Fishing Dock</color> close to the water.
!5pk! We can see that building a <color=#DF840E>Fishing Dock</color> needs <color=#DF840E>Planks</color>. <color=#DF840E>Planks</color> cannot be obtained through collecting but processing.

!5pl! In <color=#DF840E>Sawmill</color>, timber can be processed into <color=#DF840E>Plank</color>, but now the <color=#DF840E>Sawmill</color> has not been activated yet. Please click the middle area to enter <color=#DF840E>Town Technology</color> (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: T</color>), and activate the <color=#DF840E>Sawmill</color>.
!5pm! Please click <color=#DF840E>Construction</color> on the left side.
!5po! And then click the <color=#DF840E>Activate</color> button on the right side.
!5pp! Now please close the Town Technology interface after it's activated.
!5pq! We have activated the <color=#DF840E>Sawmill</color> now please click the <color=#DF840E>Processing</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 4</color>) and select <color=#DF840E>Sawmill</color>.
!5pr! Build <color=#DF840E>a Sawmill</color> at anywhere you like.
!5ps! In the previous tutorial, we have known when a structure produces variable products, we need to choose what to produce. Now please select <color=#DF840E>Plank</color>.
!5pt! Please wait for the planks are ready to complete the unfinished <color=#DF840E>Fishing Dock</color>.
!5pu! In the Technology interface, we can see lots of unactivated technologies. To activate them, you need Technology Points which can be obtained by accumulating Tech EXP.

!5pv! So we need to activate structures that can help you gain more Tech EXP first. Like <color=#DF840E>Research Institute</color>, it provides a good amount of Tech EXP and has no limit for the number of buildings.
!5pw! Now please click the middle area to enter the <color=#DF840E>Town Technology</color> again (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: T</color>).
!5px! Click the Science button on the left side and activate <color=#DF840E>Research Institute</color>.

!5py! Great! Now you have activated the <color=#DF840E>Research Institute</color>, now please click the <color=#DF840E>Services</color> button (<color=#DF840E>hotkey: 6</color>) and select <color=#DF840E>Research Institute</color>.
!5pz! Please build <color=#DF840E>three Research Institutes</color> in your preferred location.

!5q0! <color=#DF840E>The speed of gaining Tech EXP</color> will be increased after you have multiple Research Institutes or Research Academies. The development speed up if you can use papers or books.
!5q1! Let's see the acceleration from Research Institute and wait for <color=#DF840E>one Technology Point</color> is gained. The Technology icon at the top center shows the progress of Tech EXP.
!5q2! That's the basics about <color=#DF840E>Technology</color>. Please note that once the technologies are activated, they can not be canceled so please plan ahead before you activate them.

!5q4! <color=#DF840E>Trade</color> contains overland trade and water trade. First, let's get to know about the overland trade. It is mainly through <color=#DF840E>Small Trading Post</color> and needs certain amount of Laborers.

!5q5! <color=#DF840E>Factions</color> will be the one you trade with, you can use Silver coins or barter. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Logistics</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 5</color>) to open the menu bar, select and build <color=#DF840E>a Small Trading Post</color>.
!5q6! You can check the <color=#DF840E>Reputation</color> of other Factions after you build the <color=#DF840E>Small Trading Post</color>. Increase your Reputation by <color=#DF840E>Trading</color>.

!5q7! Reputation can help you activate new structures, obtain recipes or other rewards. Please press Hotkey <color=#DF840E>C</color> or directly open <color=#DF840E>Factions</color> through the trade structure to check the Reputation level of all factions.
!5q8! Trading affects the price of goods in the market and the price of the same goods differ from different factions.
!5q9! Please press Hotkey <color=#DF840E>V</color> or open <color=#DF840E>Price</color> directly through the trade structure to check out the price of goods of other factions.
!5qa! Since we've known about the factions and price of goods, let's give a try. Please <color=#DF840E>form a caravan</color> in the <color=#DF840E>Small Trading Post</color>.
!5qb! Please make sure you have enough laborers before you form a caravan. Now please click <color=#DF840E>Form a caravan</color>.
!5qc! After entering the <color=#DF840E>Caravan Setting</color> interface, you can check the <color=#DF840E>Round-trip time, Caravan number, Risk of death and other information</color>.
!5qd! Please select a faction to trade.
!5qe! Please click the area to enter the <color=#DF840E>Sell Items</color> interface. The items that currently owned and are available to trade will be shown here.
!5qf! Select the items you would like to sell, please click the plus symbol and choose the <color=#DF840E>Sell</color> button. You will see the revenue once it's all set.
!5qg! After selecting the items to sell, let's select items you would like to purchase. Please enter the <color=#DF840E>Purchase</color> interface.
!5qh! Select items and quantities you would like to purchase and click the <color=#DF840E>Purchase</color> button. You will see the cost when it's all set.
!5qi! After you've chosen items you would like to sell and buy, please click the <color=#DF840E>Form</color> button to form a caravan.
!5qj! Overland trade is usually risky, the caravan could be in danger. You can try to cover your loss through Technology and purchasing Insurance.
!5qk! Now we've tried overland trade, let's learn the <color=#DF840E>water trade</color>. First you need a <color=#DF840E>Dock</color> If you want to trade through the river.

!5ql! You can use Silver Coins or barter in the <color=#DF840E>Dock</color>. The <color=#DF840E>Order</color> function is also available in Dock for ordering specified supplies, but can only be traded with silver coins and at a higher price.
!5qm! Thank you for finding a suitable settlement for us, and now we can create our own home in the new territory.
!5qn! Next, you will face various challenges. Whether you need it or not, I will guide you through the early stage, and you can also choose to close it in the middle.
!5qo! On the right is the task goal I set for you, and you can get the corresponding silver coin reward through the task goal.
!5qp! With these coins, you can trade and deal with emergencies.
!5qq! Survival and survival are without resources. Please collect nearby resources.
!5qr! Use the Command button (<color=#DF840E> hotkey: 0</color>) to collect resources.
!5qs! With resources, housing can be provided to homeless citizens to solve their problems.
!5qt! The House is under the Houses button, (<color=#DF840E> hotkey: 1</color>). Build 4 houses.
!5qu! Excrement is a very valuable resource, we can make full use of it, and protect the health of citizens within the scope.
!5qv! The Latrine is under the directory of the Services button, (<color=#DF840E> hotkey; 6</color>) please build a Latrine
!5qw! Birth, old age, sickness and death are the laws of nature. For those who have passed away, we must cherish and respect them. Please build a Cemetery.
!5qx! In the Services button, (<color=#DF840E> hotkey: 6</color>) select the Cemetery for construction.
!5qy! Architecture is actually alive. It will also age and damage. To maintain and repair the building, please build a Repair Shop.
!5qz! In the Services button, (<color=#DF840E> hotkey: 6</color>) select the Repair Shop to build.
!5sa! Select it in Houses (hotkey: 1). Citizens with their own house can recover stamina quickly. Press <color=#df840e>R</color> to rotate structure while placing.
!5sb! Click on the building to open building menu.You can disable the building by toggling the green button in the leftside of the building's icon.
!5sc! Production will <color=#df840e>stop</color> and the workers will also <color=#df840e>leave</color> after being disabled.
!5sd! Increase 120 technology experience by consuming paper while working
!5se! Increase 220 technology experience by consuming ropes while working
!5si! The Event window can be closed temporarily, and reopened by the event info in the lower left corner.
!5sj! The numbers of Builders, Repairmen and Traders need to be adjusted in the related structures.

!5sl! The Livability Proficiency will be increased when clerics, doctors and other service structure workers are working. Livability Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5sm! The Science Proficiency Level increases when teachers and researchers are working. Science Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5sn! Trade Proficiency Level increases according to the trade amount made by traders. Trade Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5so! Mining Proficiency Level increases when miners, quarrymen and other mining workers are working. Mining Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5sp! Construction Proficiency Level increases when builders are working. Construction Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5sq! Agriculture Proficiency Level increases when farmers, herdsmen and other agriculture workers are working. Agriculture Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5sr! Processing Proficiency Level increases when knitters, sugar makers and other production building workers are working. Processing Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5ss! Logistics Proficiency Level increases when transporters are working. Logistics Proficiency will be upgraded and gain bonus effects after reaching 100%, the higher the level the stronger the bonus effect.

!5su! After starting a game with customized difficulty, the 'Former customization' option will be used to save the settings. Then the settings of the 'Former customization' option will be covered by every new game started by a new customized difficulty.
!5sv! The insurance will not pay when the caravan is disbanded voluntarily, when the caravan members die of aging, or when the caravan members die in the Great Temple or the Plague.

!5t0! Having the same function as <color=#df840e>Open Mine</color>, <color=#df840e>higher efficiency</color>, owning <color=#df840e>unlimited storages</color>, but its production needs to consume <color=#df840e>Lamp Oil</color>.

!5t2! Having the same function as <color=#df840e>Mountain Quarry</color>, <color=#df840e>higher efficiency</color>, owning <color=#df840e>unlimited storages</color>, but its production needs to consume <color=#df840e>Iron Tool</color>.
!5t3! Can produce Iron Can produce Coal Construction in flat Cannot be demolished after construction Unlimited reserves Unlocked in 'Technology - Mining - Exploration Technology 2'.
!5t4! Can produce Stone. Construction in hillside. Cannot be demolished after construction Unlimited reserves Unlocked in 'Technology - Mining - Exploitation Technology 2'
!5t9! Reinforce the heating capacity of the Boiler Room, expanding the heating area.

!5ub! Our immigration applications for this town haven't been processed for a long time, guess they have no desire to take us in. Let's move on to next town.
!5um! Easter Island Mode has closed. Please enter the beta branch to continue the gameplay.
!5un! Please click the <color=#DF840E>Logistics</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 5</color>) and select <color=#DF840E>Dock</color>.

!5uo! You can trade in the <color=#DF840E>Dock</color> when the <color=#DF840E>Merchant Ship</color> arrives. When the trade is done, the Trader will <color=#DF840E>ship the items to Warehouse</color>. Now please build <color=#DF840E>a Dock</color>.
!5up! Once the Dock is built, all you need to do is wait for the Merchant Ship to arrive and trade. The arrival time of Merchant Ship will be shown in the timeline in the upper right corner.
!5uq! You can trade with the Merchant Ship during the time it's docked.
!5ur! You have completed the very last tutorial, let's start your own town!
!5us! If you meet any problems in the game, you can check the Help Log or enter the tutorial to learn again.
!5ut! You can grow the population of the town through natural childbirth or receiving <color=#DF840E>immigrants</color> to your town.

!5uu! However, <color=#DF840E>immigrants</color> have the possibility of carrying disease, so please consider well before receiving them. Besides, you will need to build a <color=#DF840E>Town Hall</color> to receive <color=#DF840E>immigrants</color>.

!5uv! <color=#DF840E>Town Hall</color> is an essential structure to receive immigrants and hire manager. Please click the <color=#DF840E>Services</color> button (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey: 6</color>) and select <color=#DF840E>Town Hall</color>.
!5ux! You can use the feature <color=#DF840E>Ban</color> to set up resources so that the resource will not be available for consumption and will only be used in processing.
!5uy! Please click <color=#df840e>Town Details</color> (<color=#df840e>hotkey: I</color>) and click <color=#df840e>Stock Management</color>.
!5uz! In <color=#df840e>Stock Management</color>, you can <color=#df840e>ban</color> resources of the same type or <color=#df840e>ban</color> a single resource.
!5v1! Please click on the Agriculture button, also (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey:2</color>) can be used to open the Food button.
!5v2! Please select <color=#DF840E>Standard Field</color> and build <color=#DF840E>two</color> in a good spot.
!5v3! After having the field, we can grow crops for adequate food supply.
!5v4! Please click <color=#DF840E>Standard Field</color> to enter the info of Standard Field.
!5v5! While the crops are growing food, we will build the other essential part of life, a source of water.
!5v6! Please build a <color=#DF840E>Big Well</color> for citizens.
!5v7! Please open the Resource button,（<color=#DF840E>hotkey: 3</color>）select <color=#DF840E>Big Well</color>,
!5v8! and build it in the right place.
!5v9! Citizens now have clean and hygienic water. There are other edible food or seeds around the town.
!5vb! Also at the resource button, （<color=#DF840E>Hotkey;3</color>）, choose <color=#DF840E>Gatherers Hut</color>.
!5vc! Gatherers Hut are best built in the woods, but not too far from residential areas.
!5vd! Except gathering plants, citizens can also go hunting.
!5ve! Please build a <color=#DF840E>Hunters Hut</color> in order to hunt the nearby animals, and to acquire their cubs.
!5vf! With the development of citizens and cities, the demand for timber will increase.
!5vg! Please build a <color=#DF840E>Foresters Hut</color> to meet the demand for timber.
!5vh! Please open the Processing button (<color=#DF840E> hotkey: 4</color>), here,
!5vi! I can process primary raw materials to produce different products to meet different needs.
!5vj! With clothes, you still need a warm home in the cold winter, please build <color=#DF840E> Chopping House </color>
!5vk! Keep houses warm and help citizens survive cold winters.
!5vl! In the process of labor, there are certain accidents, and citizens will be injured and sick.
!5vm! Please build <color=#DF840E>Clinic</color> to treat citizens' diseases and improve the health of citizens in the area.
!5vn! Citizens have a healthy body and a higher spiritual pursuit. The church meets the religious needs of the citizens within the scope
!5vo! At the same time to improve their happiness, please build a <color=#DF840E>Chapel</color>.
!5vp! Caravan members have signed employment contracts. Their profession can't be changed.

!61r! Town Attractiveness influences <color=#df840e>the number of tourists</color>, <color=#df840e>prices in scenic areas</color> and <color=#df840e>the number of immigrants from tourists</color>. There are four ways to increase it. -Meet tourists' requests (the primary way). -Build tourism structures. -Add decorations to scenic areas. -Increase the Health and Happiness of the town.

!6bg! Education is critical to society. This policy determines the education direction of the town.
!6bh! "The life of the dead is placed on the memories of the living." The policy determines how the dead are buried.
!6bi! Proper housing is the basis of a healthy society. The policy will determine housing density.
!6bj! Water is the source of all life. The policy will regulate how citizens use water resources.
!6bk! Agriculture is the foundation of an economy. The policy regulates food import and export prices.
!6bl! Crops are a blessing of nature. The policy regulates how fields will be harvested.
!6bm! We value communication and trade among factions. The policy will determine the direction of trade in the town.
!6bn! Water is the silk road of trade, and the policy determines the trading mode at the dock.
!6bo! The quality has effects on prices. The policy determines the direction of the manufacture in the town.
!6bp! Many products are processed in the town, but the labor force is limited. The policy determines the production of various products in the town.
!6bq! Industrial structure affects town development in every way. The policy determines the town's focus on different industries.
!6br! Welcome new faces or shut the door to them? The policy determines whether immigrants will be accepted.
!6bs! Beliefs give people strength and hope. The policy determines whether religions will be encouraged or not.
!6cx! Build the Dock or Crematorium to unlock.
!6cy! Unlock House Upgrades in the Town Technology to unlock.
!6d0! The Reputation Level of any faction reaches 2 to unlock.
!6d2! Build the Large Trading Post to unlock.
!6d4! Processing Proficiency Level reaches 2 stars to unlock.
!6d5! Processing Proficiency Level reaches 2 stars to unlock.
!6d6! The population reaches 250 people to unlock.
!6d7! Build the Town Hall to unlock.
!6d9! The town will not focus on any educational direction.
!6da! Science and technology are a primary productive force. Town education will focus more on science education.
!6db! The body is the temple of the soul. The town education will focus more on physical education.
!6dc! "Ashes to ashes, dust to dust." Inhumation will be adopted in the town.
!6dd! Water gives life. River burial is the beginning of spiritual rebirth. River burial will be adopted in the town.
!6de! The last flame of life. Cremation will be adopted in the town, which can proceed in the Crematorium.
!6df! The town will adopt the current housing policy.
!6dg! Distance produces beauty. Low-Density Housing Policy will be adopted in the town.
!6dh! Land is a finite resource. To make as much use of land as possible, High-Density Housing Policy will be adopted in the town.
!6di! Citizens may be allowed to drink dirty river water, but doing so may put them at a high risk of contracting diseases.
!6dj! Citizens are forbidden to use and drink dirty river water directly.
!6dk! The town will not intervene in trading.
!6dl! The price of importing and exporting food will be cheaper.
!6dm! The price of importing and exporting food will be more expensive.
!6dn! Every grain is precious. Farmers will collect the crops for storage as they are reaped.
!6do! Organized land farming brings greater efficiency. Farmers will first reap all crops at once and then collect them for storage.
!6dp! Besides crops, other things in the field can also be used. Farmers will collect grain straws and bean straws.
!6dq! The town will maintain regular communication and trade with the factions.
!6dr! No town can produce everything all alone. The town will strengthen communication and trade with other factions.
!6ds! The dock remains in the current trading mode.
!6dt! Trade brings broader choices. The dock will switch to Ordering Mode.
!6du! Trade should be a win-win situation, not a zero-sum game. The dock will have more merchant ships stop by.
!6dv! The town will remain in its current production pattern.
!6dw! Where quality is job number one, the town will make efforts to improve the quality of certain products.
!6dx! Low quality and low prices may provide short-term benefits. The town will shorten the production period of certain products.
!6dy! The town will remain in the current processing pattern.
!6dz! Meat is a healthy nutrition source. The town will focus more on meat processing.
!6e0! Alcohol can comfort lost souls sometimes. The town will focus more on beverage processing.
!6e1! Fancy trade goods worth more Silver Coins. The town will focus more on trade goods processing.
!6e2! Decorative and durable construction materials are always desirable. The town will focus more on construction materials processing.
!6e3! The town's industrial structure will remain unchanged.
!6e4! Protecting the environment is our duty. The industrialization of the town will be more environmentally friendly.
!6e5! The processing industry makes citizens' lives more convenient. The town will focus more on the processing industry.
!6e6! Trading brings prosperity. The town will focus more on trading.
!6e7! Manually decide whether to accept immigrants when they arrived.
!6e8! What we will go through together in the future can bond us together. The town will receive all immigrants.
!6e9! The peace and stability of the town are precious to everyone. The town will reject all immigrants to avoid uncertainty.
!6ea! The town will remain in its current state.
!6eb! We should leave ourselves time to think, reflect and be grateful in this busy world. The town will encourage religious activities.

!6jv! <color=#df840e>Policies</color> and <color=#df840e>Edicts</color> can boost the growth of your town. You can change <color=#df840e>Policies</color> in the <color=#df840e>Town Hall</color>, but within <color=#df840e>10 years</color> after changing the policy, you will have to spend Silver Coins to revise it again. Policies have buffs and debuffs so be careful of your choices. <color=#df840e>Edicts</color> can be activated in the <color=#df840e>Palace of Justice</color>, but you need to unlock it in Town Technology first. The maintenance of Edicts requires Edict Coins. You can gain more Edict Coins by unlocking and building the <color=#df840e>Office of Edict Dissemination</color>. You can also maintain Edicts by spending Silver Coins when your Edict Coins are not enough.

!6kg! Your citizens have encountered some problems.
!6kh! Know well about your citizens. You can check what problems are bothering them when you can see some prompt icons on the left.
!6kj! Homeless citizens <color=#df840e>recover physical stamina slower</color> and work inefficiently.
!6kk! Now build houses for your citizens. Click the Houses button (<color=#df840e>hotkey: 1</color>).
!6km! Citizens who have houses to live in can quickly restore stamina. Living in better houses can greatly improve citizens' Happiness.
!6kn! Please build enough houses to ensure no citizen is homeless.
!6kp! Sufficient food supply is the basis for citizens' survival. Fields will be the main food source in the early stage of the game.
!6kq! Please click on the Agriculture button, also (<color=#DF840E>Hotkey:2</color>) can be used to open the Food button.

!6ks! Fields have busy seasons as well as slack seasons. There are three stages to the busy season: sowing, farming, and harvesting. In the slack season, farmers will help laborers to transport goods.
!6kt! Now try building some Standard Fields. Remember to <color=#df840e>build more Fields</color> when the food reserves are low.
!6kv! Citizens need drinks to survive. Water is the most accessible drink.

!6ky! Water can not only be used in survival and production but also in transaction. When there's fire, citizens will get water from Water Mill and Big Well to put out the fire. So it's important to make sure there are enough of these buildings in town.
!6l1! Some citizens have <color=#df840e>no tools</color>. Work efficiency greatly decreased.
!6l2! Open Processing and build a <color=#df840e>Smithy</color> and select a product for making tools.
!6l4! Some citizens have <color=#df840e>no tools</color>. Work efficiency greatly decreased.
!6l5! Open Processing and build a <color=#df840e>Smithy</color> and select a product for making tools.
!6l7! There are citizens who lack clothing. It will be hard for them to work outdoors in cold weather for extended periods.
!6l8! The <color=#df840e>Tailor</color> produces clothes. You can find it in the <color=#df840e>processing button (4)</color> under the category of Textile.

!6la! Simple clothes can be made in Tailor Shops. Flax, Alpaca Wool, and Leather are materials that can be obtained through gathering and hunting, where there is also a chance to obtain seeds and cubs.

!6lb! If you are unable to obtain seeds and animal cubs for an extended period, you can build a Trading Post to obtain them through <color=#df840e>trade</color> or <color=#df840e>order</color> them at the Dock.
!6ld! When Happiness value is low, the food consumption is sped up, and the crimes may occur when happiness value of citizens is too low.
!6le! There are 7 ways to improve the Happiness, such as improving <color=#DF840E>Garment, Shoes, Food Ration</color> and so on. Try increase the citizens' Happiness by developing your town!

!6lg! When Health is low, citizens are more susceptible to disease, greatly reducing their work efficiency. If the health level is too low, a plague will break out. The plague will spread to a large area and easily cause a large number of deaths.
!6lh! There are also seven ways to improve the Health, such as <color=#DF840E>Medicare, Sanitation, Waste Disposal etc.</color> The Health of citizens is important for the development of the town.

!6lj! The Event Indicator at the upper right corner of the screen shows upcoming events <color=#df840e>in the next 12 months</color>.Here you can see the upcoming events such as merchant ships, immigrants and disasters.
!6lk! Immigrants are heading towards the town. Be prepared if you want to accept them.
!6lm! Your Timber reserves are low. Use the command button (<color=#df840e>hotkey: 0</color>) to obtain more timber.
!6ln! After clicking <color=#DF840E>Fell Trees</color>, please select an area on the map. Citizens will collect related resources in the selected area.
!6lp! Storage-type structures are important. Building them <color=#df840e>next to processing-type structures</color> can greatly benefit production efficiency.
!6lq! You can select what type of items to store in a storage type structure by clicking the <color=#df840e>Storable Items</color> button below the building panel.

!6ls! Pastures produce stable food output and other animal by-products. But you need to obtain animal cubs to start raising. Animal cubs can be obtained through <color=#df840e>trading at the Dock or hunted by hunters</color>.
!6lt! If you want to raise the same animal in multiple pastures, you can transfer the same animal species from other pastures.
!6lv! You have placed a field. You need to <color=#df840e>select a crop</color> and assign farmers to start sowing seeds.
!6lw! Please arrange <color=#df840e>enough farmers</color> to ensure the harvest will be done before winter.
!6m0! A product has not been selected.
!6m1! Please note that production-type and processing-type buildings will only start to work after <color=#df840e>selecting a product</color>.

!6m2! Product with multiple recipes can be <color=#df840e>automatically changed</color> to the feasible recipe according to the items in stock.If you have materials that you don't want to be consumed, you can <color=#df840e>uncheck the recipes</color> and those unchecked recipes will not be used automatically.
!6m4! You can arrange the number of workers in each structure based on production needs.
!6m5! When opening the building panel, you can use the hotkey <color=#df840e>'+'</color> to add workers and <color=#df840e>'-'</color> to reduce workers.
!6m7! You can select any citizen to view his/her detailed information, including health, happiness, stamina, carrying capacity, education, efficiency, employment, current tasks, and other statistics.
!6m8! Check the citizens'status to know their needs, fullfilled needs grants extra <color=#df840e>happiness</color> and <color=#df840e>health</color> bonus.
!6ma! Can <color=#df840e>trade</color> with various Factions through the trading structures.
!6mb! You can form a caravan after selecting a trading Faction and items if you have enough laborers.
!6md! Tech points are automatically obtained during the game and can be used to unlock more powerful features and structures.
!6me! Building schools and Research Institutes can greatly increase the speed of Tech Points output.
!6mg! You are now checking the Town Details panel, where you can see detailed information and all kinds of statistics.
!6mh! In the Stock Management panel, you can organize items by banning certain ones. Banned items cannot be consumed by citizens, but can only be used for processing.
!6mj! There are citizens suffering from the cold weather, their Health will continue to reduce until they die if they remain in a cold state.
!6mk! Let's build a Chopping House. Click the processing button (<color=#df840e>hotkey: 4</color>).
!6mm! Except for Timber, Coal is also a fantastic domestic fuel which can be obtained from Mines.
!6mp! Citizens are starving and require food. If they do not get food soon, their HP will start to decrease. When their HP reaches 0, they will die of starvation.
!6mq! Some citizens are <color=#df840e>hungry</color>. Select Gather Plants in Command toolbar to assign laborers to collect wild vegetables. People without work currently will go gathering too.
!6ms! All warehouses are full. Production and processing work cannot proceed properly!
!6mt! To continue production work, please build the Storage Yard for temporary storage.
!6mv! You can adjust the game speed or pause anytime.

!6mw! You can accelerate the game (<color=#df840e>hotkey: F2</color>) to reduce the waiting time for construction and gathering to complete. And slow down (<color=#df840e>hotkey: F1</color>) or pause (<color=#df840e>hotkey: Space Bar</color>) the game when planning your town layout.
!6my! Laborers are not inferior! They are important to keep the town running.

!6mz! Laborers actively take transportation work and implement gathering orders. They also automatically take over the jobs of other citizens who have passed away. Therefore, it’s advisable to maintain a certain number of laborers.
!6n1! Fields are unable to grow and produce food in the winter. You will need more food reserves to survive the winter.
!6n2! Other than adding more fields, you can also build the Gatherers Hut, Hunters Hut, and Fishing Dock to obtain food.

!6n4! Stuctures such as <color=#df840e>Gatherers Hut, Hunters Hut and Fishing Dock</color> can obtain food monthly. While structures like <color=#df840e>Field, Orchard</color> will produce food yearly.
!6n5! Please build a Gatherers Hut. You can find it by clicking the Resources button (<color=#df840e>hotkey: 3</color>). Building it in heavily wooded areas is recommended.
!6n7! In the process of labor, there are certain accidents, and citizens will be injured and sick.
!6n8! Please build <color=#DF840E>Clinic</color> to treat citizens' diseases and improve the health of citizens in the area.
!6na! Architecture is actually alive. It will also age and damage. To maintain and repair the building, please build a Repair Shop.
!6nb! In the Services button, (<color=#DF840E> hotkey: 6</color>) select the Repair Shop to build.
!6nd! Ore reserves are low. You can use the command button (<color=#df840e>hotkey: 0</color>) to get some Ore.
!6ne! Ore on the map is not renewable. You can unlock Mines or Quarries in the Town Technology (<color=#df840e>hotkey: T</color>) to have a stable output of Ore.
!6nf! Do you want to turn off all guides? You can turn them back on in the Settings.
!6nh! Building warehouses near production and processing-type structures can greatly enhance work efficiency.
!6ni! The Compost Plant generates the resource point of Fertile Soil and increases the output of agricultural structures.
!6nj! Animals in pastures can reproduce even if there is only 1 in it.
!6nk! While the Dock only allows for bartering, the Trading Post permits the sale of items.
!6nl! The Mill generates Seeds Point and increase the output of pastures.
!6nm! The Boiler Room allows houses within its range to no longer need fuel.
!6nn! Citizens' work efficiency will be reduced if they are far away from their workplaces.
!6no! Please be careful when leveling mountains as they cannot regenerate.
!6np! The use of paper and books significantly increases the efficiency of research-type structures.
!6nq! Crops in the field needs to be harvested soon, or they will freeze in the winter.
!6nr! It takes years for Orchard and Forest Farm crops to reach maturity.
!6ns! Farmers do not work during the slack season (plants won't grow in winter). And they will work as laborers instead.
!6nt! Disasters can be turned on or off in the Settings.
!6nu! If all warehouses are full and there is no place to store the output materials, production will stall.
!6nv! Plants on the map can be gathered as food supply but it's not a long-term solution.
!6nw! Different crops differ in their yields and maturity times.
!6nx! You can order all goods from the Dock, but the price there is more expensive.
!6ny! You can choose to 'Fell Trees' or 'Plant Trees' in the Foresters Hut.
!6nz! Attending school can delay citizens' entry into the workforce, but it can also enhance their work efficiency.
!6o0! Reserve a certain number of Laborers if possible.
!6o1! The higher the Tourist Satisfaction, the more Premium Tourists will be attracted.
!6o2! Building a Supply Terminal in the scenic spot can be a good idea.
!6o3! The Quarry and Mine cannot be removed once built.
!6o4! You can disable certain items in the Town Details (hotkey: I) - Stock Management panel.
!6o5! If you have any question during the game, you can press letter <color=#df840e>(O)</color> on keyboard to open the <color=#df840e>Help log</color>.
!6o6! Press the left shift and then click the building to quickly copy it.
!6o9! Press the F11 key to open Photo Mode, hide all menus and observe the town at a close distance.
!6ob! - The grassland radius of the Mill increases by <color=#1ab028>2</color> and the Water Mill increases by <color=#1ab028>3</color>.
!6oc! Build the Mill or Water Mill to unlock.
!6oe! - The radius of the Compost Plant's fertile soil range increases by <color=#1ab028>2</color>.
!6of! Build the Compost Plant to unlock.
!6og! A type of vegetable that grows in <color=#df840e>Fields</color>. It's a kind of raw food and is directly edible. The output increases by <color=#df840e>100%</color> during the Halloween Event.

!6oi! In addition to <color=#DF840E>Gathering</color>, citizens can obtain meat, furs, animal cubs and other by-products through <color=#DF840E>hunting</color>. So you will need a <color=#DF840E>Hunters Hut</color>.
!6oj! Please open Resources toolbar(shortcut: 3) to build <color=#df840e>a Hunters Hut</color>.
!6ol! Hunters will hunt <color=#df840e>animals</color> on the map and <color=#df840e>have chances to get cubs</color>.
!6pp! Level I Animal Plague has broken out!
!6pq! Level II Animal Plague has broken out!
!6pr! Level III Animal Plague has broken out!
!6ps! Level IV Animal Plague has broken out!
!6pt! There will be a Great Harvest!

!6pu! Earthquake Level I - Houses without reinforcements or shockproof floor foundations may be destroyed. - 50% of stored supplies in Storage Yards will be damaged. - Jade Points and Gold Points will vanish and all wild animals will flee the area. - New mountains may form after the earthquake.

!6pv! Earthquake Level I~II - Houses without reinforcements or shockproof floor foundations may be destroyed. - Accidents will occur in Mines and Quarries and result in fatalities. - 50% of stored supplies in Storage Yards will be damaged. - Jade Points and Gold Points will vanish and all wild animals will flee the area. - New mountains may form after the earthquake.

!6pw! Earthquake Level I~III - Houses without reinforcements or shockproof floor foundations may be destroyed. - Accidents will occur in Mines and Quarries and result in fatalities. - 50% of stored supplies in Storage Yard, Warehouses and Small Warehouses will be damaged. - Jade Points and Gold Points will vanish and all wild animals will flee the area. - New mountains may form after the earthquake.

!6px! Earthquake Level I~IV - Houses without reinforcements or shockproof floor foundations may be destroyed. - Accidents will occur in Mines and Quarries and result in fatalities. - 100% of stored supplies in Storage Yard, Warehouses and Small Warehouses will be damaged. - Jade Points and Gold Points will vanish and all wild animals will flee the area. - New mountains may form after the earthquake.
!6py! Plagues - Plagues will break out among citizens.
!6pz! Animal Plague Level I - 1 type of animal will be infected. Each type of animal will infect 1 pasture. - Animal plagues are contagious and have an incubation period.

!6q0! Animal Plague Level I~II - 1 - 2 types of animals will be infected. Each type of animal will infect 1 pasture. - Animal plagues are contagious and have an incubation period. - Herdsmen will also be infected.

!6q1! Animal Plague Level I~III - 2 - 4 types of animals will be infected. Each type of animal will at least infect 1 pasture. - Animal plagues are contagious and have an incubation period. - Herdsmen will also be infected.

!6q2! Animal Plague Level I~IV - 3 - 6 types of animals will be infected. Each type of animal will at least infect 1 pasture. - Animal plagues are contagious and have an incubation period. - Herdsmen will also be infected.
!6q3! Great Harvest - The output of farmland increases by 30%. - The output of orchards increases by 30%.
!6q4! Typhoon Level I - Will trigger lightning strikes and lead to 1 death every 5 days. - Trees in orchards and forest farms have a 20% chance of being destroyed.

!6q5! Typhoon Level II - Will trigger lightning strikes and lead to 2 death every 5 days. - Trees in orchards and forest farms have a 40% chance of being destroyed. - Wild trees that live over 180 days will be destroyed.

!6q6! Typhoon Level III - Will trigger lightning strikes and lead to 3 death every 5 days. - Trees in orchards and forest farms have a 60% chance of being destroyed. - Wild trees that live over 120 days will be destroyed.

!6q7! Typhoon Level IV - Will trigger lightning strikes and lead to 5 death every 5 days. - Trees in orchards and forest farms have a 80% chance of being destroyed. - Wild trees that live over 90 days will be destroyed.
!6q8! Tornado Level I - A small tornado. - Will destroy trees and crops and harm citizens and animals in its path. - The size of the tornado will become smaller when destroying trees along the way.
!6q9! Tornado Level II - A medium tornado. - Will destroy trees and crops and harm citizens and animals in its path. - The size of the tornado will become smaller when destroying trees along the way.

!6qa! Tornado Level III - A large tornado. - Will destroy trees, crops, and buildings and harm citizens and animals in its path. - The size of the tornado will become smaller when destroying trees and buildings along the way.

!6qb! Tornado Level IV - 2 large tornados will show up at the same time. - Will destroy trees, crops, and buildings and harm citizens and animals in its path. - The size of the tornado will become smaller when destroying trees and buildings along the way.

!6qc! Floods Level I - All farmland and quarries on the flat floor will be flooded, resulting in their inability to function. - 2% of the population will be killed by floods. - May generate new Fishing Points.

!6qd! Floods Level II - All farmland and quarries on the flat floor will be flooded, resulting in their inability to function. - 5% of the population will be killed by floods. - All wild animals will be killed by floods. - May generate new Fishing Points.

!6qe! Floods Level III - All farmland and quarries on the flat floor will be flooded, resulting in their inability to function. - 8% of the population will be killed by floods. - All wild animals will be killed by floods. - May generate new Fishing Points.

!6qf! Floods Level IV - All farmland and quarries on the flat floor will be flooded, resulting in their inability to function. - 10% of the population will be killed by floods. - All wild animals will be killed by floods. - May generate new Fishing Points.
!6qg! Drought Level I - The output of fishery and structures that use water power will decrease by 50%. - All Fishing Points will be gone.

!6qh! Drought Level II - The output of fishery and structures that use water power will decrease by 50%. - All ships will strand. The Water Trading Post will be unable to form caravans. - All Fishing Points will be gone.

!6qi! Drought Level III - The output of fishery and structures that use water power will decrease by 100%. - All ships will strand. The Water Trading Post will be unable to form caravans. - Citizens who have been drinking raw water will be 100% infected with disease. - All Fishing Points will be gone.

!6qj! Drought Level IV - The output of fishery and structures that use hydropower will decrease by 100%. - All ships will strand. The Water Trading Post will be unable to form caravans. - Citizens will have no raw water to drink. - All Fishing Points will be gone.
!6qk! Snowstorm Level I - Work efficiency will reduce by 40%. - The temperature will drop 10℉ (6℃).
!6ql! Snowstorm Level II - Work efficiency will reduce by 40%. - The temperature will drop 20℉ (11℃).
!6qm! Snowstorm Level III - Work efficiency will reduce by 80%. - The temperature will drop 20℉ (11℃).
!6qn! Snowstorm Level IV - Work efficiency will reduce by 80%. - The temperature will drop 30℉ (17℃).
!6qo! Sandstorm Level I - Citizens will have a 0.1% chance of getting Tracheitis. - Citizens's Health will be reduced by 5 point per 3 day when being outdoors.
!6qp! Sandstorm Level II - Citizens will have a 0.2% chance of getting Tracheitis. - Citizens's Health will be reduced by 5 point per 3 day when being outdoors.

!6qq! Sandstorm Level III - Citizens will have a 0.2% chance of getting Tracheitis. - Citizens's Health will be reduced by 5 point per 3 day when being outdoors. - The Trading Post will be unable to form caravans. Departed caravans will have a 50% death risk.

!6qr! Sandstorm Level IV - Citizens will have a 0.2% chance of getting Tracheitis. - Citizens's Health will be reduced by 8 point per 3 day when being outdoors. - The Trading Post will be unable to form caravans. Departed caravans will have a 80% death risk.
!6qs! Ice Storm Level I - Citizens' movement speed will reduce by 20%. - The chance of citizens getting Fractures, or Sprains will increase by 0.1%.
!6qt! Ice Storm Level II - Citizens' movement speed will reduce by 20%. - The chance of citizens getting Fractures, or Sprains will increase by 0.2%.

!6qu! Ice Storm Level III - Citizens' movement speed will reduce by 40%. - The chance of citizens getting Fractures, or Sprains will increase by 0.2%. - All ships will strand. Water Trading Post will be unable to form caravans.

!6qv! Ice Storm Level IV - Citizens' movement speed will reduce by 40%. - The chance of citizens getting Fractures, or Sprains will increase by 0.3%. - All ships will strand. Water Trading Post will be unable to form caravans.
!6qw! Fire Level I - The fire will spread at an average speed. - Normal difficulty in extinguishing the fire.
!6qx! Fire Level II - The fire will spread at an average speed. - Normal difficulty in extinguishing the fire. - Burning structures will be destroyed quickly.
!6qy! Fire Level III - The fire will spread at a fast speed. - The fire will be difficult to extinguish. - Burning structures will be destroyed quickly.
!6qz! Fire Level IV - The fire will spread very quickly. - The fire will be difficult to extinguish. - Burning structures will be destroyed quickly.

!6r1! Typhoons occur in hot, humid, and gusty weather. They trigger lightning strikes and cause death. Strong winds will bring down trees in the wild, Orchards, and Forest farms. Building a Shelter for citizens can prevent casualties during a typhoon.

!6r3! Tornados occur in hot, dry, and gusty weather. They can cause widespread destruction, including the uprooting of trees, destruction of crops, and harm to animals and citizens. The size of tornados will get smaller when destroying trees or buildings along the way. Building a Shelter for citizens can prevent casualties during a tornado.

!6r5! Floods occur in hot, humid, and windless weather. They can cause widespread destruction, including the loss of human and animal life, damage to crops, and the inability of farmland and quarries to function. But new Fishing Points will be generated. Building a Shelter for citizens can prevent casualties during floods, while Detention Basins can help speed up the receding of flood waters.

!6r7! Drought occurs in hot, dry, and windless weather. The river level will drop, causing all ships to strand, and the output of fisheries and structures that use water power will reduce. Raw water will also be difficult to obtain for citizens.
!6r9! Snowstorm occurs in cold, humid, and gusty weather. The significantly dropped temperature will cause low work efficiency. Enough supply of clothes and fuel is crucial.

!6rb! Sandstorms occur in cold, dry, and gusty weather. Citizens who stay outdoors during a sandstorm risk losing Health points and developing Tracheitis. The overland Trading Post will be unable to form caravans, and departed caravans will have high death risks. Building a Shelter can prevent casualties during a sandstorm and prevent citizens from getting Tracheitis.

!6rd! Ice Storms occur in cold, humid, and windless weather. In an ice storm, rivers will be frozen and cause ships unable to move. Citizens who venture outdoors will have slower movement speed and increased risk of Fractures and Sprains.

!6rf! Fires occur in cold, dry, and windless weather. Structures can be destroyed and fire can spread. Citizens will fetch water from wells to put out fires. The firefighting policy can change the way firefighting is done.

!6rh! Earthquakes bring widespread destruction, including the loss of houses, collapse of Mines and Quarries which cause death, and damage to part of supplies stored in Storage Yards and Durable Storage Yards. They can also cause the disappearance of Gold Points and Jade Points. In some cases, earthquakes can create new mountains.

!6rj! Plagues are contagious and fatal. They can only be cured by activating the corresponding technology. Note that plagues can break out after accepting immigrants when the overall Health of all citizens is low.

!6rl! Animal plagues can cause death among animals in the same pasture. Animals that die from disease do not count as output. The disease can be passed to Herdsmen, leading to infection among citizens.
!6rn! Great Harvest can increase the output of farmland and orchards for this year. You can use policies to increase the possibility of a Great Harvest.
!6so! Level I Animal Plague has broken out!
!6sp! Level II Animal Plague has broken out!
!6sq! Level III Animal Plague has broken out!
!6sr! Level IV Animal Plague has broken out!
!6ss! A false alarm! No disaster happened.
!6st! The weather is changing dramatically. Disaster may occur.

!6sv! A Detention Basin can capture and store flood runoff, which is then released slowly after the flood has passed. This helps reduce the duration of the flood. The effect of Detention Basins can add up but with limitations.
!6sw! - Reduce the duration of flooding. - The effect can add up but with limitations.
!6sy! Can be built under the house as a stone foundation. It prevents the house from being destroyed by a level I - II earthquake but will be damaged in the earthquake.
!6t0! Can be built under the house as a Cut Stone foundation. It prevents the house from being destroyed by a level I - III earthquake but will be damaged in the earthquake.
!6t2! Can be built under the house as a Brick foundation. It prevents the house from being destroyed by a level I - IV earthquake but will be damaged in the earthquake.
!6t4! Can be built under the house as a Gold foundation. It prevents the house from being destroyed by a level I - IV earthquake but will be damaged in the earthquake.
!6t6! Can be built under the house as a Jade foundation. It prevents the house from being destroyed by a level I - IV earthquake but will be damaged in the earthquake.
!6t8! Can be built under the house as an Obsidian foundation. It prevents the house from being destroyed by a level I - IV earthquake but will be damaged in the earthquake.
!6th! The current possible highest level of disaster: {0}
!6ti! Disaster will not occur for now.
!6tj! As your town develops, the climate will become more severe. This could lead to a higher level of disaster and result in widespread destruction.
!6tk! Dryness and humidity affect the type of disaster that will be triggered.
!6tl! Wind is one of the factors in the occurrence of disaster. Either extremely gusty or windless can lead to disaster.
!6tm! Temperature is one of the factors in the occurrence of disaster. Either extremely hot or cold can lead to disaster.
!6tn! The weather has changed from {0} to {1}.
!6to! The structure is disabled due to the impact of the disaster.
!6tp! The structure is disabled due to the impact of the disaster.
!6tq! Unable to form caravans due to the impact of the disaster.
!6ts! A single spark can start a huge blaze. This policy determines how citizens will put out fires.
!6tw! The town will adopt fetching water to put out fires.
!6tx! Citizens will risk getting burns to fight fires with bare hands.
!6ty! The town will allow Builders to pull down burning structures.
!6tz! - Citizens can fetch water to put out fires but with the premise that Wells or Big Wells are built in the town.

!6u0! - Citizens can put out fires in the first place. The number of citizens attending firefighting will increase. - Citizens will get burns when putting out fires. Injured ones can't attend the firefighting.
!6u1! - Builders will pull down burning structures to put out fires. - The fire on burning structures will not spread if they are in the process of demolition.
!6u3! Be vigilant in peacetime. The policy determines how citizens will shelter in a disaster.
!6u7! Manually decide whether to shelter in the disaster.
!6u8! The town will actively evacuate citizens to minimize casualties.
!6u9! - Requires manual operation in the Shelter to evacuate citizens.
!6ua! - Citizens will automatically gather in the Shelter in the event of Tornados, Typhoons, Floods, and Sandstorms.
!6uc! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of the Tracheitis. Family's Happiness reduced for no place to bury the dead.
!6ud! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of the Tracheitis.
!6uf! Infected with Tracheitis induced by air pollution.
!6ug! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> are <color=#df840e>infected with Tracheitis</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6uh! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> are <color=#df840e>infected with Tracheitis</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6uj! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of Avian influenza. Family's Happiness reduced for no place to bury the dead.
!6uk! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of Avian influenza.
!6um! Infected with Avian influenza because of the spreading of animal plagues.
!6un! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> are <color=#df840e>infected with Avian Influenza</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6uo! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> are <color=#df840e>infected with Avian Influenza</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6uq! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of Foot-and-Mouth Disease. Family's Happiness reduced for no place to bury the dead.
!6ur! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of Foot-and-Mouth Disease.
!6ut! Infected with Foot-and-Mouth Disease because of the spreading of animal plagues.
!6uu! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> are <color=#df840e>infected with Foot-and-Mouth Disease</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6uv! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> are <color=#df840e>infected with Foot-and-Mouth Disease</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6ux! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of Burns. Family's Happiness reduced for no place to bury the dead.
!6uy! {1} {0} has died of untimely treatment of Burns.
!6v0! Injured by putting out fires with bare hands and unable to continue.
!6v1! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> have <color=#df840e>Burn injuries</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6v2! <color=#df840e>{0} citizens</color> have <color=#df840e>Burn injuries</color>! They need treatment in Clinics or Hospitals.
!6v3! {1} {0} has died from getting struck by lightning. There is no tombstone for people to mourn over.
!6v4! {1} {0} has died from getting struck by lightning.
!6v5! {1} {0} has died in a Tornado. There is no tombstone for people to mourn over.
!6v7! {1} {0} has died in a Flood. There is no tombstone for people to mourn over.
!6v9! {1} {0} has died in a Sandstorm. There is no tombstone for people to mourn over.
!6vb! {1} {0} has died in an Earthquake. There is no tombstone for people to mourn over.
!6ve! Farmland and Quarries are disabled due to the disaster.
!6vf! After the flood is over, farmland can grow crops again, and Quarries can operate after the flood water stored inside has drained away.
!6vg! Unable to form caravans due to the impact of the disaster.
!6vi! Unable to form caravans in the Trading Post due to the impact of the disaster.
!6vj! Caravans can be formed after the disaster.
!6vn! Animal plagues have broken out in pastures causing livestock to die. Herdsmen may also be infected.
