!6w5! Discounted items are limited, while stocks last. You may need to wait patiently for restocking or purchase at a higher price.
!6wp! The bandit camp will upgrade over time, and the more prosperous the town becomes, the faster they upgrade. After upgrading, the number and strength of bandits invading the town will increase.
!6wr! Only fertile citizens can be trained as reservists. Training requires Silver Coins and time, with only one reservist trained at a time.
!6x4! Failure to pay the monthly salary of Watchmen will result in decreased combat morale, thereby decreasing the combat effectiveness of Arrow Towers.
!6xc! After disbanding, materials will not be refunded, and squad members will become laborers. During squad formation, squad members will take weapons in warehouses to replace tools they are using.
!6xd! After disbanding, materials will not be refunded, and squad members will become laborers. Are you sure you want to disband?
!6xm! The squad will actively attack nearby enemies or Bandit Camps within a range of 16 grids.
!6xn! The squad will actively attack nearby enemies or Bandit Camps within a range of 16 grids.
!6xo! The squad will actively attack nearby enemies or Bandit Camps within a range of 16 grids.
!6xp! Bandits will actively attack buildings beyond the Arrow Tower within 16 grids
!6xq! Bandits will actively attack nearby citizens, soldiers, and buildings within a range of 16 grids.
!6xr! Bandits will actively attack nearby citizens, soldiers, and buildings within a range of 16 grids.
!6xt! After selecting a squad, left-click on flat ground or roads to move the squad to the specified location.
!6xw! Bandits will go to the Town Hall or the Marketplace to plunder Silver Coins. Eliminating bandits can recover Silver Coins.
!6xz! A <color=#df840e>Bandit Camp</color> has appeared! Bandits will invade your town in {0} years. You can train citizens into soldiers to defeat them.
!6y3! The roaming bandits without a camp have secretly invaded!
!6y4! Please be mindful of your finances! The Silver Coins are only enough to pay the Reservists' salaries for three months.
!6y5! Unpaid wages have led to a decrease in combat morale among Watchmen. The combat attributes of Arrow Towers have decreased!
!6y8! Low-level enemies armed with shields and daggers, with high defense and HP. They will actively attack citizens, buildings, and soldiers, retaliating against any attacks.
!6ya! Low-level enemies armed with spears. They will actively attack buildings other than Arrow Towers and retaliate when attacked by soldiers.
!6yc! Low-level enemies armed with bows and arrows, with high attack and long striking range. They will actively attack citizens, buildings, and soldiers, retaliating against any attacks.
!6ye! Medium-level enemies armed with shields and daggers, with higher defense and HP. They will actively target buildings and soldiers, retaliating against any attacks.
!6yg! Medium-level enemies armed with spears. They will actively attack buildings other than Arrow Towers and retaliate when attacked by soldiers.
!6yi! Medium-level enemies armed with bows and arrows, with higher attack and long striking range. They will actively target buildings and soldiers, retaliating against any attacks.
!6yk! High-level enemies armed with shields and daggers, with extremely high defense and HP. They will actively attack citizens, buildings, and soldiers, retaliating against any attacks.
!6ym! High-level enemies armed with spears. They will actively attack buildings other than Arrow Towers and retaliate when attacked by soldiers.
!6yo! High-level enemies armed with bows and arrows, with extremely high attack and long striking range. They will actively attack citizens, buildings, and soldiers, retaliating against any attacks.
!6yq! A dire beast lurks in the forest and has high combat attributes. It will actively attack citizens, buildings, and soldiers, retaliating when attacked. It will flee when its HP drops below 35%.
!6ys! A ferocious beast lurks in the forest and has extremely high combat attributes. It will actively attack citizens, buildings, and soldiers, retaliating when attacked.
!6yu! Trainees are trained in Barracks and upon completion, they become Reservists. Trainees cannot change professions.
!6yw! Reservists don't participate in daily work. They join various combat squads at different army camps. Reservists cannot change professions.

!6yy! Watchmen work in the Arrow Tower, conducting long-range attacks when enemies enter the tower's range. You need to pay monthly salaries to maintain their combat morale, or the Arrow Tower's combat attributes will decrease. They will not seek refuge.

!6z0! Shieldmen are converted from Reservists who joined the combat squad at the Shield Camp. They have high HP and defense, and will actively attack enemies and Bandit Camps within their effect range. Shieldmen cannot change professions; they will revert to being Laborers after disbanding the squad. They will not seek refuge.

!6z2! Spearmen are converted from Reservists who joined the combat squad at the Spear Camp. They will actively attack enemies and Bandit Camps within their effect range. Spearmen cannot change professions; they will revert to being Laborers after disbanding the squad. They will not seek refuge.

!6z4! Archers are converted from Reservists who joined the combat squad at the Archery Camp. They have high long-range attacks and will actively attack enemies and Bandit Camps within their effect range. Archers cannot change professions; they will revert to being Laborers after disbanding the squad. They will not seek refuge.

!6z6! Elite Shieldmen are converted from Reservists who joined the combat squad at the Elite Shield Camp. They have extremely high HP and defense, and will actively attack enemies and Bandit Camps within their effect range. Elite Shieldmen cannot change professions; they will revert to being Laborers after disbanding the squad. They will not seek refuge.

!6z8! Elite Spearmen are converted from Reservists who joined the combat squad at the Elite Spear Camp. They will actively attack enemies and Bandit Camps within their effect range. Elite Spearmen cannot change professions; they will revert to being Laborers after disbanding the squad. They will not seek refuge.

!6za! Elite Archers are converted from Reservists who joined the combat squad at the Elite Archery Camp. They have long attack range, and will target enemies and Bandit Camps within their effect range. Elite Archers cannot change professions; they will revert to being Laborers after disbanding the squad. They will not seek refuge.

!6zd! Bandit Camps will randomly spawn on the map. As your town prospers, Bandit Camps will spawn at higher levels. Bandit Camps will regularly <color=#df840e>dispatch their forces</color> to steal Silver Coins, attack citizens, and damage buildings. After accumulating enough time and Silver Coins, Bandit Camps will <color=#df840e>upgrade</color>, dispatching more and stronger bandits. Furthermore, if your town has expanded to fill the whole map and there's no space for bandits to construct camps, roaming bandits may <color=#df840e>secretly invade</color>your town. Please be vigilant!

!6zf! Beasts lurking in the forest will occasionally intrude the town, attack citizens and destroying buildings. They are <color=#df840e>extremely powerful</color>, requiring careful handling. They will <color=#df840e>flee right away</color> once their HP is low.

!6zh! You can <color=#df840e>train citizens as Reservists</color> in Barracks, <color=#df840e>organize them into squads</color> at Army Camps, and command squads to intercept invading enemies. You can also directly <color=#df840e>attack Bandit Camps</color>, destroying their base, but you need to be careful of the fortifications at Bandit Camps. <color=#df840e>Building Arrow Tower</color> can intercept invading enemies. You need to pay Silver Coins to maintain Watchmen's readiness to fight in combat. <color=#df840e>Forging suitable weapons</color>, <color=#df840e>continuously providing military supplies</color> can significantly improve combat capabilities.
!6zk! A bandit camp has appeared on the map, and it will continue to send bandits to invade the town.
!6zl! Training Reservists and organizing squads can intercept bandit invasions and destroy Bandit Camps.
